class.name: agent.tasks.knowledges.CombatSupport
class.description: The knowledge of the 'combatSupport' mission. This knowledge is used by the company commander to perform its own tasks.

method.name: getPionEfficiency
method.description: Return the efficiency (a score which value is defined between 0 and 1) of the agent to perform this mission. The higher the returned value is, the best the unit is to perform the mission.

argument.name: companyTask
argument.description: The string name of the company task.

argument.name: params
argument.description: The parameters of the company task.

argument.name: retrogradeContext
argument.description: Define if the mission is performed in a offensive context or retrograde defensive context). For instance, if the company task performed is "Screen" or "Delay", this parameter should be set to 'true'.
